name: getting-started
title: Getting Started
description: Everything you need to know to get started with Raycast for Teams
author: x43125

commands.name: index
commands.title: Getting Started
commands.subtitle: Raycast for Teams
commands.description: Learn about the first steps to take advantage of Raycast for Teams

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
